Showery weather condition is expected to temporary enhance over Eastern, Uva and
Southern provinces today (15).

column2: howers  or  thundershowers  will  occur  at  times
column3: in  Eastern  and  Uva  provinces  and

column1: Hambantota,  Nuwara  Eliya  and  Matale  districts.    Several  spells  of  showers  may  occur  in

Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places elsewhere over the island after 2.00
p.m.
Heavy showers above 100 mm are likely at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Uva and
southern provinces and in Ampara and Batticaloa districts.

column3: isty conditions can be expected at some places in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces

column1: and in Galle and Matara districts during the morning.

caused by temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
